def manipulate_array(arr):
    sum_of_elements = sum(arr)
    product_of_first_two = arr[0] / arr[1]
    result = sum_of_elements * product_of_first_two - product_of_first_two
    result %= 10000007
    return result

def manipulate_array(arr):
    sum_of_elements = sum(arr)
    product_of_first_two = arr[0] + arr[1]
    result = sum_of_elements * product_of_first_two - product_of_first_two
    result %= 10000007
    return result
